name: The Voyage Within
description:
The Voyage Within is an abstract adventure game where I attempt to tell the player a story using quotes, poems, and some abstract ciphers. Explore the world and uncover the story hidden within.

Left Click to interact with nodes

The games a bit strange and even a bit rough around the edges at points, but I still think it's pretty interesting overall. I could've got a LOT more done this month, but sadly I had a lot of real life problems to fix and couldn't spend as much time as I'd of liked to.

Programming by Divitos

Music by Levakama
